item.title: Forlarme RG36PRO Retro Video Game Console-Support 30000+ Classic Games 3.5" IPS Screen Open Source System 64G TF Card 3000mAh Battery Portable Console for Teen or Partner - Gift for Christmas - White
item.description:

â„¹ï¸:

  • The Players Time Machine: RG36 PRO is a handheld “time machine” that can instantly transport people back to their childhood. It supports over 30,000 classic video games from different eras. Whether its classic and popular games, well-known console games or outstanding platform games, you can start playing them with just one click of download. The intuitive interface can help you quickly locate and play your favorite games. Whether youre reliving the past alone or sitting around with friends, the RG36PRO game console can faithfully bring back the pixels and passion of the golden age to your palm.
  • Clear visual effect: The 3.5-inch IPS screen of the RG36 PRO handheld video game console, with a resolution of 640Ã—480, firmly holds every pixel of old games. The color blocks are clean and the picture is transparent, as if adding a high-definition filter to childhood. Whether its reliving old dreams or passing by a classic for the first time, just one glance and youll think, “It should be like this.”
  • Your daily gaming companion: The RG36 PRO handheld video game console compresses classic memories into pocket-sized pieces, allowing you to take them away with just a handful. While waiting for a bus, taking a lunch break or on a business trip, you can start the game at any time by taking it out. With a retro face and a modern heart, nostalgia is no longer restricted by location. You can play whenever you want.
  • Ergonomic design: The body curve and button rebound of the RG36 PRO Retro Video Game Console are all adjusted according to the palm shape, providing a glove-like fit when held, and it wont cause fatigue even after long periods of intense combat. With just 10 minutes of fragmented time or several hours of immersive gameplay, it always keeps the feel in the “perfect comfort zone”, leaving only focus and excitement for the retro journey.
  • “Note: For optimal charging, use a charger with at least 5V/2A (10W) output. Always charge via the DC port. The TF card comes pre-inserted in your handheld video game console upon arrival.”
  • Fashion Design: The RG36 PRO handheld video game console features a classic, modern and minimalist design. The consoles body has a matte texture, giving it a very high-quality feel when held in hand, which is highly favored by both gamers and collectors. The game console joystick is equipped with RGB lighting, which is a rare feature. It can enhance the fun of the game and create a unique atmosphere for players. Meanwhile, the RG36 PRO is the best gift choice for birthdays, Christmas and other festivals.
